descriptionlist.description: iSnake is a small tweak that can entertain you on the go with quickly activation.
Double tap on any home screens to activate iSnake mode. To stop the game while playing, just double tap again.
Supports 2 modes: Apps mode and classic mode
Support preference settings for some in-app configurations
This tweak is still under development, more features will come soon.
Please support by follow me on Twitter (@ReverseThatApp) and drop me a message for any feedback or issues so that I can improve iSnake in the next versions :) üêçüêç
All feedback is welcomed and appreciated and I sincerely appreciate that. Enjoy the game!! (^_^)
